title: Increased latency during peak hours
description: Latency p95 increased to 280ms during afternoon peak hours (14h-15h). No errors reported, but slow response times.
root_cause: High connection pool usage during peak traffic. Database queries taking longer than usual.
resolution: No action taken - resolved automatically as traffic decreased. Connection pool returned to normal levels.
impact: Minor - some users experienced slower response times, no failed transactions

title: Latency spike during afternoon peak
description: Latency p95 increased to 320ms during afternoon hours. Connection pool reached 90% usage.
root_cause: High traffic volume during peak hours causing connection pool exhaustion
resolution: Automatic resolution as traffic decreased. No manual intervention required.
impact: Minor - slower response times, no errors

title: Database connection timeouts
description: Intermittent database connection timeouts during peak hours. Some payment requests failed with timeout errors.
root_cause: Connection pool size insufficient for peak traffic. Database connections not being released quickly enough.
resolution: Increased connection pool from 8 to 10 connections. Added connection timeout retry logic.
impact: Medium - 15 failed payment requests, approximately 50 users affected

title: Evening peak latency increase
description: Latency increased during evening peak hours (20h-21h). Similar pattern to afternoon incidents.
root_cause: Peak traffic during evening hours causing connection pool pressure

title: Database connection pool exhaustion
description: Connection pool exhausted causing multiple timeout errors. Higher impact than previous incidents.
root_cause: Connection pool size insufficient. Long-running database queries holding connections.
resolution: Manually restarted connection pool. Increased pool size from 8 to 10. Added query timeout limits.
impact: High - 42 failed payment requests, approximately 150 users affected
